Service Details: - Provides a toll free tip-line and web-based service that allows you to report known or suspected violations of fisheries, wildlife, or environmental protection laws - anonymously and without risk of confronting the offender- Offers toll free number, cell phone number, and online reporting form for reporting options on environmental violation, poaching incident, or to report wildlife-human interactions where public safety may be at risk
